com.complexible.common.util

Class ClassPath

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.complexible.common.util.ClassPath

  • public class ClassPath
extends Object

    Utility class for managing the system class path. It will return all classes on the class path, and can override the system class loader in order to provide the ability to add classes to the path at runtime and then be able to find them (via Class.forName) and load/instantiate them in a running application.

    Since:
    1.0
    Version:
    2.0
    Author:
    Michael Grove

      • listClassesFromDir

        public static Collection<? extends Class> listClassesFromDir(File theFile)
        Return the list of classes in the given directory. This will find any "loose" classes as well as classes packaged inside of jar files. It will also recurse through subdirectories to find classes.
        Parameters:
        theFile - the directory to load from
        Returns:
        the list of classes in the directory

      • listClassesFromJar

        public static Collection<? extends Class> listClassesFromJar(URL theURL)
        Returns the list of classes at the specified jar URL
        Parameters:
        theURL - the jar URL
        Returns:
        returns the list of classes at the jar location, or an empty collection if there are no classes, it's not a Jar URL or the URL cannot be opened.

      • get

        public static Class get(String theName)
        Get a class by its class name. This will use a custom class loader.
        Parameters:
        theName - the fully qualified name of the class to load
        Returns:
        the class, or null if it is not found or otherwise could not be loaded.

        Returns the list of classes in the Jar file at the specified file location

        Returns:
